properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 27 at 3:09PM CST until January 28 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Amarillo TX
properties.description:
* WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 6
inches.

* WHERE...In Oklahoma, Beaver County. In Texas, Ochiltree and
Lipscomb Counties.

* WHEN...From midnight tonight to noon CST Tuesday.

* IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous
conditions could impact the morning commute.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Precipitation will likely begin as rain. A
wet snow will become more likely late tonight. North winds of 15
to 25 MPH may cause areas of blowing snow and will cause wind
chill values to fall into the 15 to 20 degree range.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO NOON CST TUESDAY
